Posts.Content: Is there any one with metastatic breast cancer which spreaded to liver and bone and having xeloda with taxol (paclitaxel). i want to know how it is working. and the side effects. my mom is going to start this med from next month. she had xeloda before. will be glad if any one can give suggestion.
Posts.Title: xeloda and paclitaxel (taxol)

Posts.Content: I am so sorry to hear about your mom.  But i do really appriciate her tolarance and currage to fight the disease. My mom has metastatic breast cancer she also took xeloda but had hand and foot syndrome and numness in her feet. so the doc didnt gave her xeloda any more and started gemcitabine but this chemo didnt work and the liver met became worse and now in bone also so she is having radiation and after that she is going to start xeloda again. she says it is very painful. the side effect of xeloda is really bad but i dont know about the other drug ur mom is having. But we should always appriciate their tolarance and currage of fighting this disease. so i feel sorry if any one says that her pain is not physical. i do really believe that it is very very painful physically. i pray for your mom. May god give her some relif. take care of ur self too.
Posts.Title: side effects of xeloda and avastin as treatment for IBC

Posts.Content: Hi yancy   Sorry to hear your condition. My mom has metastatic breast cancer which spreaped to liver 2 yr ago and now in bone. She has just finished radiation and now going to strat xeloda with paclitaxol. xeloda works very good in shrinking the tumor in liver but she stoped it before cuz it caused severe hand and foot syndrome. but no other chemo worked 4 her so she is going to start it again. there is all ways hope. be positive and u will win the battle.   sonia
Posts.Title: breast w/mets to liver

Posts.Content: hi My mom didnt get radiation to the liver and i dont know if it is possible to get radiation to liver. She took radiation for bone mets. She was soppose to start xeloda along with paclitaxol but as her platelet count droped due to radiation the doc is not giving paclitaxol but increased the dose of xeloda. I dont know what wil happen next. Try to read the book written by blotch. it will give you hope and way to find how to fight cancer the link is www.blochcancer.org i hope you feel better. wish you all the best.   sonia
Posts.Title: breast w/mets to liver

Posts.Content: My mom was diagnosed with breast cancer 4 yr ago now she has metastasis in liver which is 10cm and also in bone. she is having radiation for bone and than she will start xeloda for liver. which she had before and it is the only one that worked for her. I am so scared if the medicine is going to work this time. can any one tell me anything about this. i really need some help. i feel so helpless. she is having injection for her bone too. Please help me.
Posts.Title: metastatic breast cancer

Posts.Content: Hi my mom has almost same cancer like you. She was diagnosed 2003 and had radical mastactomy with lymphectomy.last year it was diagnosed that she had metastasis in liver and started xeloda. but she had hand and foot syndrome. but xeloda worked very good for her. Three months before she was again found with the liver tumor growing and started a new chemo Gemcitabine with combination with another chemo(i forgot the name). but unfortunately it didnt work and the liver tumor became 10cm. She had a bone scan recently and found met in spne, pelvil and skull. now she is having radiation and bisphosphate. after that the doc will give her low dose of xeloda again for liver. i am so helpless. dont know what will happen. Do you have any idea about this kind of patients survival rate. and do you know any new drug. if please let me know.i wish you all the happiness. i pray for you too. take care
Posts.Title: Xeloda and fatigue

Posts.Content: Hi so sorry to hear about your sister. after a long time i came back to this site. i use to write regularly when my mother was battleing breast cancer. she left us marh 7 this year. Her cancer also spreaded to her liver for that she was having xeloda. than it went to bone. she was 63 when she died. i know what people go through when some one you love is fighting with cancer. But be positive always that helps to battle the disease. good mental streangth is very important. all my prayers wiht your sister and her daughters. sonia
Posts.Title: Stage IV Breast Cancer??? Questions

Posts.Content: Is there any one with metastatic breast cancer which spreaded to liver and bone and having xeloda with taxol (paclitaxel). i want to know how it is working. and the side effects. my mom is going to start this med from next month. she had xeloda before. will be glad if any one can give suggestion.
Posts.Title: xeloda and paclitacel (taxol)

Posts.Content: Hi I think no one knows better than me how u feel. my mom was also diagnosed with breast cancer 2003 had chemo radiation. last year they found it has spread to liver last month the scan showed that it has spread to bone. My sis is a doc we are trying our best but we know there is not much time left. I live oversease i am planning to visit her and stay with her for couple of months. last two years was horrible for us. i was pregnant with my first baby after trying for 8 long years when the news came that my moms cancer has spread to liver. i waited to give birth and fly to her with my 3 month old daughter. My father died just before the day i arrived. I didnt see him for 3 years and i saw his cold dead face. It was hard to hard to touch him and say good bye. And now its time for my mom. I dont know why some people have to have all the pain. My mom is everthing to me. Every day i call her and i cant believe i cant here this voice anymore. I know there are people how has much pain than me but i cant bear it any more. Everything seems empty to me.I pray for your mom. But i know how hard it is. So keep your sperit up and think about people like me who has the same pain like you. We are all in a same boat.   sonia
Posts.Title: its back

Posts.Content: Here i am again with a broken heart and soul. My mom has passed away on 7 march after fight with metastatic breast cancer for last 5 and half year. I want to thank all the member of this site who gave me suggestion and support in this battle. I know how hard it is for family of a cancer patient to cope with this disease but there is always hope. We were also hopeful till the last moment of my moms life and so was she. I believe positive thinking helped my mom to survive this long. She never gave up. My mom will be always my inspiration.    I pray for all the cancer patient and their care giver so that they never give up  there is always hope. Please pray for my moms soul. Hope god gives me the strength to overcome her loss.   sonia
Posts.Title: My mom has passed away
